import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" function Shop(props) { const [add,setAdd]=useState(0) const increaseCard=()=>{ setAdd(add+1) } console.log(add) return (
{props.paltar.map((index,key)=>

{index.dressName}

{index.price}AZN

) } export default Shop
